products.name: SANDSTORM 001
products.description: The classic style of Spanish architecture popular in California Missions with distinct hue combinations that create a beautiful, rustic appearance with classic style and the durability of concrete.

products.name: EL CAMINO BLEND 001
products.description: Featuring Flat bottom with raised sides, they represent a classical European aesthetics and style and allow for design flexibility. Romano Pan Can also be used with Standard 2- Piece Mission, Monarch and Cielo Profiles.

products.name: SANDSTORM 002
products.description: Rustic Spanish tile features a distinct shadow line through the concrete tile that accurately replicates the look and dimension of a two-piece clay product - without the added cost and intensive labor.

products.name: SLATE 001
products.description: Country Slate is designed to complement the inherent beauty in French and Tudor architectural styles. Available in a broad range of colors, it faithfully captures the appearance of natural slate.

products.name: SLATE 002
products.description: Country Slate is designed to complement the inherent beauty in French and Tudor architectural styles. Available in a broad range of colors, it faithfully captures the appearance of natural slate.

products.name: SALISBURY COLLECTION
products.description: Manufactured with a variety of clays, Boral Residential Brick offers an extensive portfolio of colors and textures. Whether you're looking for a deep burgundy, or a pale pink; a hearty earth tone or a blend of contrasting color, Boral Bricks will have a selection to suit your style.

products.name: DRESSED FIELDSTONE
products.description: The rugged look of Dressed Fieldstone complements any natural environment. Its rich texture and range of color enhance a multitude of architectural designs

products.name: EUROPEAN CASTLE STONE
products.description: Beauty that is timeless and installation that's easy. European Castle Stone is as elegant as it is practical. Its patented interlocking mortar grooves create a precise, groutless appearance fit for stately exteriors and grand interiors alike.

announcements.text: Go to http://www.rubyonrails.org and say hello to david@loudthinking.com Apple has indeed purchased Beats, which includes both Beats Audio hardware and Beats Music, the streaming radio service that was founded by rapper Dr. Dre and longtime music industry exec Jimmy Iovine. The deal was reported to be in the works earlier this month, and was said to be worth an estimated $3.2 billion at the time, though a recent New York Post report said it was cut to $3 billion after Apple completed its due diligence. The price is indeed $3 billion, with $2.6 billion in cash and $400 million in stock. Apple typically makes smaller purchases of startups and companies most people have never heard of, so Beats is a considerable change of course for the company. The last really high-profile acquisition Apple made was NeXT, back when it bought that company to bring Steve Jobs back into the fold.

catalog_items.title: House Suki
catalog_items.html_text: While we has been recognized for excellence as the Best Suki Restaurant in cities across the country, our restaurants have also become equally famous for our menu. Guests can take in the lively atmosphere and enjoy a wide assortment of legendary food.

catalog_items.title: Landscape Design
catalog_items.html_text: Whether you prefer your landscape formal or informal, traditional or dramatically contemporary, our award-winning landscape design team will work with you to create long-lasting designs that will transform your outdoor space.

catalog_items.title: Landscape Maintenance Services
catalog_items.html_text: Landscape maintenance is much more than neat green grass and beautiful flower beds. This is why we offers an extensive list of landscape management services. Landscape Management services offered such as: Spring Clean Up, Fall Clean Up, Tree Care, Leaf Management & removal, Grass Management etc...

services.name: LEAF MANAGEMENT AND REMOVAL
services.description: Leaf Management & Removal offers gardening services including clean-ups, garden bed maintenance. We have complete range of professional garden maintenance services also.

services.name: RESIDENTIAL LANDSCAPE DESIGN
services.description: Looking for a way to express your individuality, while raising the value of your home? Our landscape design team has the talent and expertise to design beautiful landscape designs that are sure to make a lasting impact for your property.

services.name: POOLS BACKYARDS DECORATING
services.description: Relax with these refreshing swimming pool design ideas. We love what we do and it shows in our work and client relationships. We look forward to transforming your backyard into your own sanctuary of beauty.

services.name: SEASONAL FLOWER ROTATION
services.description: Flower plantings provided for each season, installed and maintained to the end of their growing season, offered in a variety of colors to best compliment every their property.

services.name: TREE CARE SERVICES
services.description: Green Garden offers residential and commercial tree care services including pruning, removal, pest management, evaluation, fertilizing, cabling and lighting protection.

services.name: GRASS MANAGEMENT
services.description: Landscape maintenance is much more than neat green grass and beautiful flower beds. This is why The Grey Barn offers an extensive list of landscape management services.

foods.name: SUKI SUOP

foods.name: SUKI MEATBALL
foods.description: Looking for an amazing and new taste experience? Try Our Suki Meatball Soup! One of the restaurant specialized and delicious!

foods.description: We offers heart-warming dining experiences at equally endearing prices. You will enjoy unlimited, top-quality fresh pork in paper-thin slices dipped in a selection of delicious soup bases.

foods.name: Fresh Fruit Ice Cream
foods.description: Wonderful Fruit Ice cream that can be made from either fresh or frozen. Enjoy your time with your family now!
